user.title: Room Setup
user.description:
Configure your room's basic lighting setup.

**Room Name Rules:**
• Use lowercase letters only
• Replace spaces with underscores
• Example: bedroom, living_room, home_office

data_description.room_name: Unique name for this automation (lowercase, underscores for spaces)
data_description.light_switch: Wall switch entity (leave blank if using lights only)
data_description.light_entities: Smart bulb entities (leave blank if using switch only)

presence_detection.title: Presence Detection
presence_detection.description: Configure motion and occupancy sensors for smart presence detection.

data_description.presence_pir_sensor: Main presence sensor for the room
data_description.presence_mmwave_sensor: Optional second sensor for better detection
data_description.sensor_off_latency_entity: Number entity that controls sensor timeout
data_description.fixed_latency_seconds: How long after motion stops before considering room empty
data_description.vacancy_timeout_multiplier: Multiply sensor delay for lights-off timing

light_levels.title: Light Level Control
light_levels.description: Configure illuminance thresholds for smart lighting decisions.

data_description.dark_threshold: Below this brightness, lights turn on (30-50 lux recommended)
data_description.bright_threshold: Above this brightness, lights stay off (150-250 lux recommended)
data_description.extremely_dark_threshold: Pitch black level for night mode (0-5 lux)
data_description.enable_illuminance_averaging: Smooth out sensor readings to prevent flickering

manual_override.title: Manual Override Behavior
manual_override.description: Control how the automation responds to manual light adjustments.

data_description.override_timeout_hours: How long manual changes last (1-24 hours)
data_description.override_respect_presence: Pause timeout while room is occupied
data_description.vacancy_clear_minutes: Room empty time before clearing override

optional_features.title: Optional Features
optional_features.description: Enable additional features like daytime control, bed sensors, and guest mode.

data_description.daytime_control_mode: How lights behave when sun is up
data_description.enable_bed_sensor: Use bed sensor for bedroom automation
data_description.turn_off_when_bed_occupied: Lights off when getting into bed

adaptive_lighting.title: Adaptive Lighting & Guest Settings
adaptive_lighting.description: Configure adaptive brightness, color temperature, fade effects, and guest mode multipliers.

data.guest_ignore_bed: Ignore Bed Sensor in Guest Mode

data_description.enable_adaptive_brightness: Brightness adapts to time of day
data_description.fade_on_time: How fast lights fade in (0.5-10 seconds)
data_description.fade_off_time: How fast lights fade out (0.5-10 seconds)
data_description.guest_vacancy_multiplier: How much longer lights stay on for guests (1.5-5.0x)
data_description.guest_override_multiplier: How much longer manual control lasts for guests (1.5-5.0x)
data_description.guest_ignore_bed: Disable bed sensor when guests visit

error.invalid_room_name: Invalid room name. Use lowercase letters, numbers, and underscores only.
error.room_name_too_short: Room name must be at least 2 characters long.
error.helpers_exist: Helper entities already exist for this room name. Choose a different name or delete existing helpers first.
error.bright_must_exceed_dark: Bright threshold must be at least 10 lux higher than dark threshold.
error.setup_failed: Failed to create setup. Check logs for details.

abort.setup_failed: Setup failed. Please check the logs and try again.
